Scene - Class in com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics
The Scene is a JFrame that will be displayed.

scenePaint - Variable in class com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.Scene
 
ScenePaint - Class in com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics
The ScenePaint is what will be displayed by the Scene.
ScenePaint() - Constructor for class com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.ScenePaint
 
ScenePaint.LineData - Class in com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics
The LineData contains all data of a Line that will be drawn on this ScenePaint, it will be drawn using Graphics.drawLine(int, int, int, int) with ( x1, y1, x2, y2) and with the Color equals to ScenePaint.LineData.color.
ScenePaint.PointData - Class in com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics
The PointData contains all data of a Point that will be drawn on this ScenePaint, it will be drawn using Graphics.drawRect(int, int, int, int) with ( x, y, 1, 1) and with the Color equals to ScenePaint.PointData.color.
scenePainter - Variable in class com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.Scene
 
ScenePainter - Class in com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics
The ScenePainter does drawing work, it draws on the ScenePaint of it's Scene.
ScenePainter(ScenePaint) - Constructor for class com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.ScenePainter
Creates a new ScenePainter.
